text: Hagi Livae naga'ma ugagotama hu'za kegavama hu'naza vahemo'zane naga'zmimo'zanena mono nompima zavenama aheno zgame'ma hu eri'zantera vugota hu'naze. Hagi ana naga'mo'za mago'a eri'zana e'ori'nazanki, ana eri'zanke eri'naze. Na'ankure maka kna ana mono nompi nemase'za kinagane, nanteranena ana eri'zanke eri'naze.
